request.schema: [{"name":"type","label":"Type","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Case Type filter (Maintenance, Service Request)"},{"name":"status","label":"Status","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Case Status filter (New, Working, Escalated, Closed)"},{"name":"priority","label":"Priority","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Priority filter (Low, Medium, High, Urgent)"},{"name":"guest_email","label":"Guest email","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Filter by guest email (Contact.Email)"},{"name":"room_number","label":"Room number","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Filter by room number (Room__r.Room_Number__c)"},{"name":"assigned_to","label":"Assigned to","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Filter by owner ID"},{"name":"limit","label":"Limit","type":"integer","control_type":"integer","optional":true,"hint":"Maximum results (default 50)"}]

properties.label: Status
properties.name: status
properties.hint: Case Status filter (New, Working, Escalated, Closed)

response.error_message: At least one filter parameter is required (type, status, priority, guest_email, room_number, or assigned_to)

input.query:
=[
  (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","type"]}').present? ? "Type = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","type"]}')}'": nil),
  (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","status"]}').present? ? "Status = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","status"]}')}'": nil),
  (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","priority"]}').present? ? "Priority = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","priority"]}')}'": nil),
  (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","guest_email"]}').present? ? "Contact.Email = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","guest_email"]}')}'": nil),
  (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","room_number"]}').present? ? "Room__r.Room_Number__c = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","room_number"]}')}'": nil),
  (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","assigned_to"]}').present? ? "OwnerId = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","assigned_to"]}')}'": nil)
].compact.join(' AND ')

extended_input_schema.hint: Send a copy of the message to Workato logs. Learn more
extended_input_schema.label: Send to Workato log service
extended_input_schema.name: user_logs_enabled
